overview: x264 is an open-source software library for encoding video streams into the H.264/MPEG-4 AVC format. It provides a highly efficient and high-quality encoding solution widely used in video compression, streaming, and multimedia applications. x264 offers advanced encoding parameters for optimizing compression and video quality.
core_features: Fast and high-quality H.264 video encoding
Fine-tuned compression settings for quality and performance
Support for various encoding profiles and settings
Integration with multimedia applications and video processing pipelines
